description: Professional law firm website for Davidson Law Group
businessTagline: Protecting Your Rights, Securing Your Future
businessDescription: Davidson Law Group has been serving the Chicago metropolitan area for over 25 years, providing exceptional legal representation in personal injury, family law, and estate planning. Our experienced attorneys combine deep legal expertise with personalized attention to achieve the best possible outcomes for our clients.
businessShortDescription: Chicago law firm specializing in personal injury, family law, and estate planning with over 25 years of experience
parkingInfo: Valet parking available in building lobby. Street parking and nearby parking garages also available.
buildingInfo: 28th floor of the Michigan Avenue Tower. Reception desk located at Suite 2800.
emergencyAvailability: 24/7 for urgent legal matters and existing clients
consultationHours: Monday-Friday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Saturday by appointment
publications: Illinois Personal Injury Law Quarterly - Contributing Author
Family Law Today Magazine - Guest Speaker

attorneys.name: Michael Davidson
attorneys.title: Managing Partner
attorneys.bio: Michael Davidson founded Davidson Law Group in 1998 with a commitment to providing exceptional legal representation to individuals and families throughout Illinois. With over 25 years of experience, he has successfully handled thousands of personal injury, family law, and estate planning cases.
education: Northwestern University School of Law, J.D., 1995
University of Illinois, B.A. Political Science, 1992
barAdmissions: U.S. District Court Northern District of Illinois, 1996
notableAchievements: Named to Illinois Super Lawyers for 5 consecutive years
Successfully argued before Illinois Supreme Court

attorneys.name: Sarah Chen
attorneys.title: Senior Associate
attorneys.bio: Sarah Chen joins Davidson Law Group with extensive experience in family law and estate planning. She is known for her compassionate approach to sensitive family matters and her meticulous attention to detail in estate planning.
education: University of Chicago Law School, J.D., 2010
barAdmissions: U.S. District Court Northern District of Illinois, 2011
notableAchievements: Chicago Bar Association Family Law Committee Chair

practiceAreas.name: Personal Injury
practiceAreas.description: We represent clients injured due to the negligence of others, including auto accidents, slip and falls, medical malpractice, and workplace injuries. Our goal is to secure maximum compensation for your injuries and losses.
processSteps: Free initial consultation to evaluate your case
practiceAreas.typicalTimeline: 6 months to 2 years depending on case complexity
practiceAreas.feeStructure: Contingency fee - no fee unless we win

commonQuestions.question: How much does it cost to hire a personal injury attorney?
commonQuestions.answer: We work on a contingency fee basis, which means you pay no attorney fees unless we recover compensation for you. We advance all case expenses and are only reimbursed if we win your case.

commonQuestions.question: How long do I have to file a personal injury claim?
commonQuestions.answer: In Illinois, the statute of limitations for most personal injury claims is 2 years from the date of injury. However, there are exceptions, so it's important to consult with an attorney as soon as possible.

practiceAreas.name: Family Law
practiceAreas.description: Our family law practice handles divorce, child custody, adoption, and other family-related legal matters with sensitivity and expertise. We understand that family legal issues are emotionally challenging and work to achieve favorable outcomes while minimizing stress.
processSteps: Confidential consultation to understand your situation
Development of legal strategy tailored to your goals
Court representation if trial is necessary
practiceAreas.typicalTimeline: 3 months to 1 year depending on complexity and cooperation
practiceAreas.feeStructure: Hourly billing with detailed monthly statements

commonQuestions.question: How is child custody determined in Illinois?
commonQuestions.answer: Illinois courts make custody decisions based on the best interests of the child, considering factors such as the child's wishes, each parent's ability to provide care, and the child's relationship with each parent.

testimonials.testimonial: Michael Davidson and his team were incredible during my car accident case. They handled everything while I focused on recovery, and secured a settlement that exceeded my expectations.
Sarah Chen helped me through a difficult divorce with professionalism and compassion. She kept me informed throughout the process and achieved a fair outcome for my children and me.

notableCaseResults.description: Birth injury case resulting in cerebral palsy due to medical negligence
Multi-vehicle accident with traumatic brain injury

consultationTypes.description: Meet with our attorneys in our downtown Chicago office to discuss your case in detail and review relevant documents.
Convenient video consultation via Zoom or phone for clients who cannot visit our office in person.
Initial phone consultation to discuss your legal matter and determine if we can assist you.

emergencyConsultation.responseTime: Within 2 hours during business hours, within 24 hours on weekends
emergencyConsultation.description: Emergency consultation available for urgent legal matters such as arrest, restraining orders, or time-sensitive legal issues.

featuresDescriptionTemplate: Over 25 years of legal excellence serving Chicago families with integrity, expertise, and personalized attention.
servicesSectionDescription: Comprehensive legal services delivered with expertise, integrity, and unwavering commitment to our clients.
servicesDescriptionTemplate: Expert legal representation tailored to your specific needs and circumstances.
contactPageDescription: Facing a legal matter? Contact us for experienced representation and confidential consultation. We're here to protect your rights and secure your future.
formMessageLabel: Brief description of your legal matter (all communications are confidential)
formSuccessMessage: Thank you for contacting Davidson Law Group. We will review your information and contact you within 24 hours to schedule your free consultation.
formErrorMessage: There was an error submitting your request. Please call our office directly at (312) 555-0123 or try again later.
attorneyClientPrivilege: All communications with Davidson Law Group are protected by attorney-client privilege and treated as strictly confidential.
confidentialityNotice: Your privacy is important to us. All consultations and communications are kept strictly confidential under attorney-client privilege.
consultationDisclaimer: A consultation does not create an attorney-client relationship. Representation begins only upon signing a written retainer agreement.
websiteDisclaimer: This website is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice. Reading this website does not create an attorney-client relationship.
paymentOptions: Contingency fee for personal injury cases
Hourly billing for family law and estate planning

accessibility.assistiveDevices: ADA compliant office with wheelchair access and assistive listening devices available

insuranceAccepted: Most major insurance companies for workers' compensation cases
